div.title: AuthorProfile home
div.div: We now have a prototype running. Look at our list of authors. We use the profiles from the AuthorClaim registration service.

blockquote.div: AuthorProfile builds a page or each academic author in the world, with all papers that they have written. When finished, it will be a replacement of the “papers published” part in academic CVs. All AuthorProfile data is freely reusable.

AuthorProfile is a service that presents authors and the papers that they have written. It is different from a normal bibliographic database that lists papers and then the the papers’ authors. AuthorProfile places the prime focus on the author.
